description:
Summary:

Empty snack bar message in Collection sheet with No internet connection.

Steps to reproduce:

1)Run the app
2)Select Collection Sheet from side menu

Expected behavior:

A snackbar message which shows "failed to fetch office" since internet connection is not available.

Observed behavior:

Empty snackbar

Device and Android version:

Android 5.0.2,API 21
name: Mifos Android Client Bug Fix: Empty snackbar message in Collection sheet
